about.subtitle: I specialize in crafting dynamic and responsive user interfaces using React and Next.js technologies. I'm also deeply passionate about full-stack development, particularly in the MERN stack.

primary.content: With over 2 years of hands-on experience in the software field, I've had the opportunity to work on diverse projects, honing my skills and gaining valuable insights into the ever-evolving tech landscape. My journey has equipped me with the expertise to tackle complex challenges and deliver innovative solutions.
